titles: Little Iohn and the four beggers, a new merry song of Robin Hood and little John, shewing how Little John went a begging, and how he fought with four beggers, and what a prize he got of the four beggers, the tune is, Robin Hood and the begger.
notes: Date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
keywords: Little John (Legendary character) --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
Robin Hood (Legendary character) --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
